Simon Cowell is the boss of this show. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl Cole . The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk.''*** The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen. As soon as it's announced she's going to be a judge the plan will be to launch her music career in the States. It's important Americans realize she's a credible music star if she's going to be judging other singers. *** Simon Cowell is said to be trying to find a way for him and Cheryl Cole to carry on starring in the British version of the show alongside the US program. A friend of Cheryl Cole 's rumoured boyfriend Derek Hough said: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US' X Factor' in the bag.`` The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced.`` They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. Simon Cowell is now reportedly doing all he can to convince his American business partners that the 27-year-old Girls Aloud star has what it takes to draw audiences in across the Atlantic. Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. `` You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world.
